name: Transformation
description: With the completion of the metamorphosis, the former skin that reflected a mere temporary shell for the realization and accomplishment of a perfect and legendary existence, has been shed, and what was destined has been achieved. Now, what stands before is not simply a transformation from one form to the other, but the visualization of the course of achieving perfection, the complete abandonment of weakness and flaws, and readily transitioning to an objectively perfect form. This exclusive curation, embellished in scintillating silver and gold symbolizes the ascension to a higher plane of existence, one that other low forms can never hope or strive to achieve, for metamorphosis is a luxury only vested in your hands, exclusively for you.
